documents.document:
she's out of my life

You seem to be go, take belongs to us that age, I thought you can eternal life, and I thought you can be in our world forever belongs to the singing, it is at least in my lifetime.

I was 80, the popular music understanding began in Hong Kong and Taiwan, began in "four major Kings", that year I was 10 years old, their song in my heart young ignorant a deep imprints, I am not a fanatic fans, more is not a fanatic fans, but I love music, because I love my life. Music can express my one of life's attitude a kind of longing.

The music should contact MJ is late 90 s, I was to music craze is unprecedented, this is what we that era symbol, we will buy thick stack on CD, hiding in a friend's home listening to his songs, see his clever dance, see his classic MV, then we can't help but to follow to sing, although English let us some effort. We will imitate his steps, although imitate some obscure. But this all doesn't prevent us from the love of the music of MJ. Perhaps this is the star, he can break time, space, language, race, culture limit, deep infection we this generation of most of the crowd.

Maybe I should be thankful was born in this era of star birth, at least, I think so. Now I want to again in search for a can struck me music, I found that I cannot find, in the 21 st century star is really too much, and songs is multifarious, but can move my and there is a few first, though we will enjoy singing in the KTV, we love the song sing just a few or that first. Though I'll at night when want to listen to music, I found that want to listen to songs or that a few first. I cannot say now to hear the song, because I can see there are still a after 90 as we had that to music madness. They have the same in teenage characteristics of the character of youth.

So the more should be left MJ's end, one belongs to the popular music of our love s of end. Of course there is more contains we of this generation life attitude, the pursuit of, our values. People is fond of different time was born into the different times, because each different age men, all has the age of common features, and music is even more so, has the strong characteristics of The Times. Every era of music, would be associated with each age person's growth. And the music just as I MJ most gold age. Hear his song, I'll remember that moved past, those people, those things, those scenes. Those who laugh, the tears, the pictures, the mood, always in the haunting, left my steps. So music of the highest form is spiritual resonance, and it is not just a simple linear spectrum, notes, more important is it can infect us, impress us, let our inner shock, and MJ's greatness lies in his music can let the world is moving, a chord with, I think about the future should won't have this kind of star. There are concerns that as long as doing music can reflect a big love, can love peace, and positive progress, and to be able to reflect human most great place, that can make it popular. However, from MJ later again no one can transcend.

MJ go, for a time painting of the period, and for my part of the picture's end. Walk good MJ, you are always in my heart. MBT Fora Women's MBT Staka Sandals Women's MBT Habari Sandals

Symbol meaning

SongGuZhuang: a small village names in xuanhua from to on the path of zhangjiakou where necessary. Is such a text symbols, represent a station or a place name. When I passed by from here. Who will know the place name of those behind story?

In this place, there is my classmate. This year they life how, I don't know, because I have many years no real into this place. In my memory, this place name and my middle school language teacher about, and my distant brother-in-law relevant, and a call SongChunMei about the woman, and my classmates SongYaLi relevant. Better memory, just stay in the early s, I often overlooked is the SongGuZhuang is also keep pace with The Times, spoke of a place name, or a person's name, the person's memory had only stay in the years to come.

That year, I from zhangjiakou no.3 coach station a get on the car, my father told the conductor, I want to SongGuZhuang the stop. The conductor's attitude is very kind, so that a long time I believe that she is met with his father. Because, I get on the bus, she always let I sat on her lap, that feeling has been the mind. The car, [people more, she taught me a liberation army, the people's liberation army (PLA) body have a strong soapy taste. For a long time I and they all knew each other for, I know her name is SongChunMei. People's liberation army (PLA), north Korea is the family name Portsmouth people. Every Saturday, I will sit of zhangjiakou, back to my coach her mother's side. No matter that spring or fall, more cold winter. If my mother not to go to the station to meet me, and then my aunt is certainly going to the station to meet me. Each time, on the way home, my aunt will and I said many words, when my aunt also but 22 and three years old, pretty young. Go tired, she will be back. In the winter I sand is very big, she always and my mother's meet me, I for aunt memory, is only when she was young alike that piece of yellow party turbans. How simple and poor memory. Aunt countless times and I said, I don't go to pick you up, you were afraid of the Wolf, thanks to go walk thanks you, your mama sad, I also less. At that time no children ShenZi nephew. But at that time the Wolf is rarely see. (here and cut out the father and I speak, meet the Wolf's story)

Until now, I will not forget SongGuZhuang name this station. Elementary school graduation, I went back to the old house, top junior high school of time, every day I should pass SongGuZhuang to small ZhongXinJiao, which is to go to school. I have a classmate called SongYaLi, because what I can remember her name, because, that is, her eyes in the class of the men and women living largest, and hair is bringing that kind of volume. I heard many of the students said, bring their own hair roll of individual character is strong, and hard life, I don't know SongYaLi life is like a rock hard, but I heard later, she and our classmates SanMa married, not years, less than thirty years old SanMa, died YuPang at home in iron ore landslides.
Once again, see SongChunMei, is I lived in this city for many years. That morning, my wife and I go to the morning market for the food, I see a special familiar figure, in the vegetable stall out food. I see her along while, until she stood up, I see her face so far, because I want to make sure if I admit mistake a person. I gave a cry song aunt, she looked at me along while, ask me, are you? I was very embarrassed, but I still say to her. Don't you remember me? When I was little, always sat in your car, you still hugged me. She won't believe that a child would have to her such deep memory. I say this, her eyes welled tears, yeah, I can't meet you, so big, you which unit work? When I put the unit that I tell the song aunt, she is very exciting holding hands, ask my father, ask my brother, she that day smiles brightly. Later, SongChunMei aunt son looked for me. Later, he does not look for me, I'm not her news. If she had still been alive, I think she has is 7056 old man. MBT Rafiki GTX Boots MBT Meli Shoes

Yesterday, today and tomorrow

The blink of an eye a year passed, but feel like remain yesterday, people were time pushing constantly moving forward go, have no time to stop to look at, think! Friends to visit with yesterday a retired old judge, and he goes in the gossip, stimulating! His 12 words, indeed, then the true meaning of life of him, "here, helpfulness, light is the happiness". It sounds simple, but real can do it, is also one of the few!

For I will tell on a New Year wish is to body health, success in work! Since yesterday has already into the past and take the good today, my future in tomorrow!!!!

Tibet, my heaven

Tibet, one of my dream. For many years, I've always dreamed of stepped into the miraculous land. Many years, I am all sorts of worry, I don't know if I'll be able to go to and then the peace of peace back, so, I didn't play a sound to go without. I with my family, if I am not duly return, you don't feel sorry and cry, I must have been in the heaven of a big bird away! If some year while one day, a bird in the tree kept screaming, that must be I came to see you from heaven to!
Now, I come back of peace. I want to tell you, this one a life time, if you have never been to Tibet, is this life one regret. Don't take sorry walk in this life, you have to go and see Tibet there sunshine, Tibetan girls face blooms of bright and beautiful smile, the child that seemed to be able to get the heaven and the earth big eyes, you want to go over a few steep there snow-capped mountains, in every mountain pass, you want to talk SuoSuo cried out with a loud voice, that is Tibetan guy AWang teach my auspicious!
You don't listen to other people say Tibet, you don't also wrote the book according to others to go to Tibet to walk, you according to your heart may want to how to go the way, you will find that, that's what you own and any one of the same trip to Tibet.

End is a kind of state

1

Life is the best state is a rich quiet. Quiet, because out of the outside world FuLi moves the temptation. Rich, because have the inner spirit of the world treasure.

2

Lao tze advocates "ShouJing tuk", let everything in there together, sports, I just wait the reciprocating, so it can be the master of all things movement. This is called "static for rashness king".
Of course, people are not only static motionless, even can also not desirable, such as pool. Your body can travel in the world, your mood may in the world of mortals of ups and downs, the key lies in your spirit must have a quiet core. With this core, you can become your the hustle and bustle of the body and the ups and downs of mood in the host.

3
No matter how busy world, lively always occupy only a small part of the world, lively, the world outside the boundless and there's a my position, a quiet place. It was like in the sea, someone frolic, someone to paddle, somebody found shell, someone get together to talk, and I might as well look for a quiet corner is sitting alone. Yes, a corner-on the boundless sea side, where can't find such a corner-but I see? Is the sea, perhaps more than those busy playing together to see more complete.
In a quiet position, to see the world lively, looking to go to the back of the vastness of the infinite world, this may be the most suitable for my temperament stead it. MBT Fora

Make bitter desire

Talk about marriage is like an embarrassing topic, no one wants to touch this kind of topic. It is no wonder that, because, if you praise marriage, and so you prove his mediocre, if you attack the marriage, and waited so you in the indictment their spouses, anyway, how to say all wrong. The results, "marriage" by "recall" instead.

This deliciously ironic. In real life, is the refuge of marriage memories: when our marriage changed, we recall ever some love, to a firm confidence; When our marriage despair, we recall the former lover, to comfort, to be exact-deepen their pain.

But, this just is that, in the life stage, marriage is a important role, give us how complex feelings, shouldn't miss. So, in to introduce a new character before, first I want to restore its position, and let the "recall" stand back.

So, life stage character have so five: love, marriage, happiness, romantic, life. Now I want to tell you, I discovered that, the five role actually are a real protagonist mask, is the real protagonist in the shell by performance, the name of it called-" desire ". MBT Kisumu Sandals

Selection appropriate mbt shoes

How can we choose the suitable mbt shoes, first of all look at the appearance, because of that if the shoes styles you do not like, then how you can feel the comfortable feeling bring by the shoes, after you have your favorite style, then you can do as following:

When you buy a pair of shoes, the most important issue is that if the shoes are suitable for you, though many people said that this pair of shoes is very well, if you do not wear it to feel the feelings then you do not know weather it suitable for you, so when you buy mbt shoes I want you can have a try before you buy it, many people may feel it inappropriate after buy it, if you can note it at the beginning, then you can avoid much trouble, you must pay attention to the fit between soles and uppers, notice that whether the glue average, in general if you cannot see the traces of glue then it's could have good working, if the uppers are shaped around glue marks, that would be a worse one.

Also hand button is not easy to open plastic. Otherwise open to wear long rubber shoes, and glue the color should be white and transparent (except for black shoes and dark, if dark that is a transparent black), if there is yellow or other colors do not buy, because there are some shoe factories to cut costs, the use of harmful glue containing three stupid and paste mixture, affect the environment will affect the health firmly resisted. Materials used for the uppers, we may pay attention to what is the skin.

The overall structure is upper, midsole, outsole. Identify material non-professionals: The end usually rubber outsole, rubber total understanding of it, and the bottom layer of shoes. The middle layer is called the bottom, so EVA material from the outside, it is the kind of angular, as it should be by cutting Pouching, less smoother and very light, shoes must be the lightest. The case of IP / PHOLOY two out from the mold, no edges, EVA difference between this and what, as they have been low. There is also a PU (usually plus a cushion), you can recognize at a glance, the weight than the IP / PH / EVA heavier. Having said that, I think you should be able to distinguish one about the. Mbt-the Shape Up Shoes

Have you heard of the new shape up shoes or trainers that claimed to have the multi-function and will bring a new lifestyle? Well it sounds interesting and I am curious that what I will find by this shape up shoesBT.

MBT, short for Masai Barefoot Technology, is claimed to be versatile footwear. These shape up shoes can tone you body whilst you are wearing them and walking. It really sound like a dream come true that you will get toned body just when walking the dog, walking to the shops, work or just out for a stroll or even wearing them around the house whilst doing your house work and chores. However, do they really work? There is a unique design in sole that can give us better balance, more movement and correct our posture. All these benefits come from a sensor, or a roll bar in the sole just under the heel. When wearing these shoes, you will feel like walking on the sandy beach or a mossy surface. By activating the unused muscles in the feet, these shoes can really make you take smaller steps, stepping onto a slightly bent knee and then pushing off with a straight leg that activates your hamstrings and gluteal muscles which are associated with your buttocks.

Thus these shoes, they say, can then exercise our muscles in a gentle form of workout like simply walking. These MBT shape up shoes have an unstable sole that will really support the middle of the feet. The sole is designed to be unstable to create barefoot walking effect. They can easily rock you backwards and forwards. This can provide the great balance training and affects the whole posture and get the better posture and gait. Usually we are taught to stand up tall, keep shoulders back and your tummy in. Well if you stand in front of the mirror at home, you will find that to get the proper figure, it is really necessary to get our abdomen and stomach muscles strong to assist us to do this by themselves and that means improving our posture and exercising and strengthening these muscles to do that. All we need will just be realized by this shoes that not only work on the heels and toes but the whole body. Indeed that is why this MBT shoe is called shape up shoe and brings the new lifestyle.

Therefore, if all the said above is true, MBT shoes are really worth a try. However, be enjoyable in these shape up shoes and only the wear can tell what the truth is.

Old Rose Types - A Guide On Old Roses

Felicite Parmentier
The origins of this delicate beauty are completely unknown. It first appeared in about 1836 and ever since has captivated with the opulence and delightful fragrance of its flowers, which open in June from large clusters of yellowish round buds above the leaves. The pale, blush-pink flowers develop from almost globular shells to a grand flat, almost creamy-white rosette, in which the inner corolla is closely folded, producing a sort of green eye at the center of the flower. What we have here is a merging of styles, a quality typical of quite a number of Old roses. Flowering is so long and luxuriant that the canes tend to bend over and therefore must be supported.

MME PLANTIER
'I like to look at it in moonlight,' Vita Sackville-West wrote of ''Madame Plantier', 'It glows besides the old apple tree like a pear-shaped ghost.' She had planted a 'Madame Plantier' to climb into an apple tree in her garden; eventually it grew until it was 14m(46 feet) around.At first creamy-white and later pure-white flowers appear in great clusters from pointed, rose-red tinted buds at the end of long, almost prickle-free canes hanging over, and needs support to give it shape. As a climber, too, it needs to be firmly secured. Its loose growing pattern and long canes would tend to suggest that this is no pure ALBA rose.

'SEMIPLENA' is another white Alba rose that was very popular as long ago as the Middle Ages. It is a powerful shrub rose growing to nearly 2m, which produces a rich display of fragrant, half-full flowers followed by large red hips.

KONIGIN VON DANEMARK
Many regard this as the most beautiful of all the Alba roses. It was created in 1816 in the Flottbek nursery of the Scots-born James Booth as a seedling of 'Maiden's Bush', When in 1826 he first included it in his catalogue, he dedicated it to Princess Marie Sophie Friederike of Hessen-Kassel, the consort of King Frederik V1 of Denmark. This should come as no surprise

.

Without hope

How long, why always forget time actually stay in which the crossing, why those things from his more and more far away. Maybe some promise in the export of said it was time to break, maybe a lot in the beginning of the end had already written, perhaps this person only exists in order to wait for them coming, namely however doomed is so, so, and those that do not pay attention to the story or forget it...
Some things, not forget, so desperate, it always this consolation, tell yourself, and said, let it be, just forget something let nature take its course will only with the passage of time increasingly precipitation, more and more thick move around. Someone asked, you know the opposite of love is what? His quiet answer, at least not hate. Should be such, love a person the deep love, and how to hate his cruel? Talk about the hate just to quell his unwilling and lonely just! Want to forget someone. A process to the lack of the end but.

Always believe that deep in the memory of pain, had long been deeply buried. However, when the scorching by, the pain of degradation disguise layer upon layer, from frozen giddy sleep wake up, to drop of blood, canker, that the swaying temperature, a bite, ripped plucks history, in seasons to show off the memories. Perhaps, had already forgotten......

A man, walking in the streets of rough, the sadness of heart bottom jammed compression, always a pair of composure, forget apathy. Slightly pain high tide of a flooded to struggle, some places, so cruel clear, began to clear, take off gentle, no love, so stubborn ground tearing thy skirts, colic fingers, gritted his lower lip, can't hold the gas is still missing, and walking, they can only use consistent way, the scar is often thousands renditions of information. Fragment awaiting perfection saying to yourself, perhaps, in this life also can such, missed how to turn back to feel tears will is a kind of happiness?

Some things, always get rid of it. For example, lonely. Loneliness is kill man's poison. For example, miss. Missing is the soul of the broken bridge. Want to go to all the people smile, just, a thing, no matter how deep in my heart again for practice, is always a not long hypocrisy. In his cage, lick in the heart of injury. Perhaps, love itself is in a spirit of war, without bloodshed has sacrifice. The bloody feeling, as if stick on the love as a chopping board "fish", tossing a few poor, still hide not shave off a heart the cycle of bone. Close your eyes, appear in the mind is ever the blurred of look in the eyes, and profane the changes in temperature, the tears of outside despair, dead of that "I'm sorry". Just, at the outset, whether there really is a warm existed in life?

With a friend, with joy to tone, just want to tell a friend said, now I had a very good, don't worry, really very good, although sometimes will be the little lonely, but just a little bit a little bit just!

diary

Now one of the biggest little city change is people pay more and more attention to toughen body, whether in the morning or after dinner, or dance or jump, or scurry or jogging people became this quiet town of a beautiful landscape.

After dinner yesterday I and son came to the city square, here was thronged with very lively. Square center is a big fountain, children love in this play, often wet body to get parents scolded. On the northern side of the open space on some of the Chinese shuttlecock kicking is people, men and women to a circle, put a beautiful red feather shuttlecock played upside-down, especially the big belly man will sticking with his big belly time props, unconsciously let people clap to him. Chinese shuttlecock kicking around this is a circuit of yangge run old lady, basic it LiuShiJi years old, the movement is slower, I do not love in this to linger.

The most appeals to me is south square, where most people, music is the most ring, need you through the crowd into to see things clearly. Here is a play and a dance, first, a stronger player young, old, will jump, can't jump to rabbit dance together, ten steps, then lun and, tango, slow three almost four of I also points not too clear, anyway just gradually in the class. Every time I come to will search for that a partner, I think they are full of the best dancing, not only because women beautiful man handsome, important is because only the pair partner that has a tacit understanding, the mouth cape always hang smile, is the real dance out some beauty of soul. I also became their dance silk, always have the urge to go up to strike up a conversation. Next to the lap of the people is independent dragon-shaped canoes pulling the yangko team, here is also the three layer in the three circles around a lot of the audience, yangko team is uneven, old and young, men and women really reflects the whole people to participate in an spirit, also not distinguish three or four columns is echelon, you after I catch, ke is too without stumbling ke no technical level, a simple four small step to go be multifarious, that is such a large national team, that's what I'm like, hey hey, not only because I also technology are not good, I just want to pursue this simple happiness. But in this huge team still have that several twist to hold. That's some elder brothers, or fat or thin, or high or low, the skeleton muscle in the body is fully aroused, and whole body disorderly and chatter, the sweat, so I also learn their appearance, carried high feet, and bowed down their heads, and rear its head, stopped, one, two, three, four, follow the beat more come to twist, face smile bloom. Almost followed the team or fast or walk slowly go off and a to hours, ZhongTian spread. Down the field, is a feeling: dizzy, the earth like tilt, I also like in a turn. So all the way home with dizzy, simply still twist go well, made my son push me a and Sang me. The way, there are still distributes the people, the children of ice gently, brought the dog of woman, the male full display to go quickly with high "going friend", leading to hug waist of intimate lover, at this time the star of the high, the wind qing, still can be many sweat, feel red-faced emit hot air, but the mood is surprisingly good, really, is surprisingly good, want to find you and I share the happiness, really think you in the side with me to share.

Off work, I should go home, the dinner can not be delayed, yangko have continued to!

The wretched ambiguous

Everything comes from one of his prose, he wrote his memories of youth things, is very touching. Then a large group of the placard, one of his sentence, made a small mistake, I'm back, back to the post. Before long, I receive a message: xx hello to you, thanks to correct me, also attached behind his QQ number. I added him, and they began to all night long talk.

He is so the wind hasten and melancholy a man, he told me how he from a poor little place came to the big cities, people with how to damage. I was silent for, hair a hug expression in the past. He return to say: the cold night, your company is really good. Sings that comment, I heart humid.

The night will probably grow many ambiguity of the mood, our subject unconsciously by literature turned to a guarantor.

A strange phone call: know who I am? Magnetic audio delivery man, come over, the object is crisp itchy. Maybe I have been longing for the subconscious have such a passion of passion. When he was in the end ask: your finger now where I have involuntary thoroughly began to fall. After that, I often naked body lying in bed waiting for his call.

Things turn in me to go to is a small bar.

I know there's a young handsome drummer, and quickly with his cohabitation. Before sleeping every night I turn off the phone, on the second day, the secretary sets midnight phone calls have reminded. I think, this is his clear to him.

I went to the literature BBS, see a his post, that is a very obscure wen, wrote a kind of feeling, to love helpless and feeling desperate, the word is filled with pain. I know he is writing us.

He has been the head of QQ gray, I try to send the information in the past. His head to light up, hair to 1: you are enough malicious!

Like ordinary lovers quarrel, we in the QQ had a quarrel, he mad in the QQ to me...

I think one side in the real world have boyfriend's love and considerate, and side in unreal world and a lover enjoy a feast desire, is really a enjoy things. Her boyfriend often very late, this paragraph of time becomes my tryst with him the best time.

Finally one day, her boyfriend saw this scene, I frightened. He hit me, packed the things left. I worry and degrees up, be afraid of me and that man's entangled will destroy him later feelings. But to him, I am so mad. I decided to, to his city to see him, for he gave his life once, and then thoroughly the paragraph.

Off the train, I called his cell phone, and he was very excited, tell me to a hotel, let me waiting for him there.

I wash bath dressed up waiting to see him. I was like, maybe met there is no network that kind of kin feeling, but, my skin has too much about his voice and memory, I too want to truly feel about and he together the sex feel.

At midnight, someone knocked at the door. Opened the door to see a bunch of bright rose, I am delighted. Next, I saw a makes me very disappointed man. He did not rape me, but I was grudgingly took off his clothes lying in bed, let his thumb.
